tamyla.bio: 7+ years building production systems on Cloudflare Workers. Creator of Clodo Framework. Previously architected edge infrastructure at scale.

cloudflare-workers.quote: Migrated our auth service from Lambda in a weekend. Cold starts went from 800ms to literally zero. Our users in Australia finally stopped complaining.
cloudflare-workers.author: Sarah K.

cloudflare-workers.quote: The billing model alone saved us $4k/month. We were paying Lambda to wait on OpenAI API calls. Workers only charge for actual compute. Game changer.
cloudflare-workers.author: Marcus T.

cloudflare-workers.quote: Honestly skeptical at first—sounded too good. But after running both in parallel for 3 months, we're all-in on Workers. The DX with Clodo Framework sealed the deal.
cloudflare-workers.author: Dev R.

developer-experience.quote: The instant 'Try Now' button changed everything. I evaluated 5 frameworks in an hour because Clodo let me start coding immediately.
developer-experience.author: Alex M.
